description:
Lion visits the dentist for severe tooth pain. Tasked with creating a company mascot, the three coworkers touch base with old friends for research.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Africa Secretaries / Africa Dentist / Africa Mascot Characters / Africa High-School Girls: Mascot Character Trade Fair
